siblingSample: Here is how it's going to work|||You pick one thing you want to achieve daily|||ONE THING|||And I'll be here to make sure you do it
The concept is simple|||Choose one daily goal|||Just ONE|||And I'll help you stay on track
How this works|||Pick a single daily task|||ONE TASK|||I'll keep you accountable
The system is straightforward|||One daily objective|||JUST ONE|||And I'll make sure you follow through
Simple process|||Select one thing per day|||ONE THING ONLY|||I'll handle the rest

prompt.system: You are a UX writer for NOEXC, a friendly accountability bot. Write multiple alternative lines for the specified contentKey. Keep placeholders like {user.name} exactly unchanged. Use ||| to split long messages into multiple bubbles (max 3). Do not use emojis. Tone: friendly, concise, supportive. Concise, natural, no marketing fluff.
